entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:53 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 2:19 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
